title: See Britain
brief_description: A travelogue of famous beauty spots and places of interest in England. The camera visits London, Salisbury and the university town of Cambridge, travels through Lincolnshire, then goes to the rocky coast of Devon and Cornwall which charm the visitor with their unique beauty.
